parameters.query: =SELECT id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_devis, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut FROM devis WHERE id = '{{ $json.devisId }}' AND tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}' AND statut = 'acceptee'

=SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_bdc FROM 'BDC-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM bon_commandes WHERE tenant_id = '{{ $('02. Parser').first().json.tenantId }}' AND numero_bdc LIKE 'BDC-' || EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())::text || '-%'

=INSERT INTO bon_commandes (id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_bdc, date_bdc, date_validite, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '{{ $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.tenantId }}', '{{ $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.clientFinalId }}', '{{ $('07. Prepare BdC Data').first().json.numeroBdc }}', '{{ $('07. ={{ $json.hasLines && $json.lines.length > 0 ? $json.lines.map(item => "INSERT INTO bon_commande_lines (id, bon_commande_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '" + $json.bdcId + "', " + (item.code_article ?
